Text: RE Crude PrepaysWe need everything although I would have thought the ISDAs confirmations and guarantees were everything Send it all overnight to Liisa Transaction Support Department at Enron House in London Thanks Matt Original Message From Heard Marie Sent November To Landy Matthew Mulbrecht Liisa Subject Crude Prepays Mary Cook has asked me to try to locate the documentation for the two prepays Which of the documents do you specifically needall or just the ISDAs swap confirmations and guarantees If you only need the ISDAs etc it may be quite a lot of pages to fax Would you prefer I overnight them and if so where should I send them Thanks Marie Marie Heard Senior Legal Specialist Enron North America Corp Phone Fax
